intro_script: "Imagine having a personal assistant, a camera, and a soundtrack for your life, all wrapped up in a stylish package. Introducing the Meta Ray-Ban Smart Glasses, where fashion meets innovation. With these sleek and comfortable glasses, you can capture life's moments, stay connected with friends and family, and experience the world in a whole new way. Want to take a hands-free photo or video? Just say the word. Need to make a call or send a message? Just ask. The Meta Ray-Ban Smart Glasses are more than just a gadget - they're a new way to live, work, and play. So why settle for ordinary, when you can wear something extraordinary? Discover the Meta Ray-Ban Smart Glasses, and see the world with a fresh perspective."
